experiences.title: Clube Delivery - volunteer
experiences.description: I was responsible for the creation and implementation of the checkout flow in the application developed in React Native. On the backend, I used NestJS to develop and structure modules, create endpoints, and integrate functionalities. I participated in the conception of the interfaces, collaborating in the creation of screens in Figma.

experiences.title: Labenu
experiences.description: Taught live classes to students, corrected projects, and prepared pedagogical material. Code review of student projects with feedback on the code.

experiences.title: Ten
experiences.description: I work on the development and maintenance of Ten's Regulatory Portal, a SaaS platform for managing regulatory documents, such as the Reference Form required by the CVM. Acting in the entire product life cycle, from the implementation of new functionalities to the maintenance of existing ones, ensuring security and compliance with regulatory standards.
